description:
Dig & Drill is Season 13 of SnowRunner. Included in the Year 4 Pass. Requires the base game SnowRunner to run.

Local authorities in the region of Almaty, Kazakhstan need your help to kickstart a new mining venture. Conduct geological surveys, supply the quarries with essential equipment and reopen the cargo airport with the use of 2 new vehicles.

The Season 13: Dig & Drill expansion includes:

•	A new 2km² map set in Almaty. A rugged, remote corner of Kazakhstan where sprawling mountain ranges meet dense coniferous forests and giant mineral quarries.
•	Two new vehicles: the PLAD 450, an 8x8 powerhouse equipped to handle any job, and the AAC-58DW, a wide-body scouting SUV fit for any terrain thanks to its superior stability.
 
New activities: Help the local government rebuild their mining infrastructure by conducting geological surveys, rebuilding the cargo airport, delivering equipment and transporting valuable raw materials.
name: SnowRunner - Season 13: Dig & Drill
